name: Distant Guns: The Russo-Japanese War at Sea
name_original: Distant Guns: The Russo-Japanese War at Sea
description:
Distant Guns: The Russo-Japanese War at Sea is a strategy game developed by Storm Eagle Studios. It came out on 27-07-2006. It was published by Storm Eagle Studios.
Distant Guns: The Russo-Japanese War at Sea is available on PC.
